name: AnimeConscom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: AnimeCons.com provides a list of anime conventions around the world. Using the AnimeCons.com database, this Alexa Flash Briefing will tell you what anime cons are coming up this week so you can head out to meet other anime and manga fans and cosplay at an anime con near you.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
